page.title: 18OUR KESTREL
page.content: On Sunday my Dad goes to the park to fly the {Kestrel.}A kestrel is a bird of prey. We found it on a road. A few months ago my dad made a shed for the kestrel.sometimes my dad can't take the kestrel to the park because he has to go on a fire call's and he has to go to the fire station and drive off in the fire Engine and put fire's out.While my dad is doing this my mum cleans up the house I sometimes help her when my brother is at the park.On monday after school we sometimes go to the sea front and have a walk.
